translation.en: - They've broken through the front lines! - I've lost contact with the capital!
translation.es: ¡Atravesaron las líneas del frente! ¡Perdí contacto con la capital!

translation.en: Sorry I'm late. I hit a little traffic.
translation.es: Perdón por llegar tarde. Había mucho tráfico.

translation.en: Autobots, fall back! Get to the tower!
Destroy the launch pad! Let none escape!
translation.es: ¡Destruyan la plataforma! ¡No dejen que nadie escape!

translation.en: Cybertron has fallen. Get to the escape pods.
translation.es: Cybertron ha caído. Ve a las cápsulas de escape.

translation.en: There are other Autobots scattered across the galaxy.
translation.es: Hay otros autobots dispersos por la galaxia.

translation.en: We must reach them if we hope to survive.
Optimus, this is our home. We have to fight for it.
translation.es: Este es nuestro hogar. Tenemos que pelear por él.

translation.en: We will fight on. But we must find refuge first.
translation.es: Seguiremos peleando, pero antes debemos buscar refugio.

translation.en: I found a planet that's well hidden. Earth.
translation.es: Encontré un planeta bien escondido, la Tierra.

translation.en: You will travel there and establish a base for us.
translation.es: Viajarás allá y nos instalarás una base.

translation.en: Once we've gathered the others, we'll join you.
translation.es: Después de reunir a los demás, te alcanzaremos.

translation.en: If the Decepticons find it, then our people are truly finished.
translation.es: Si los decépticons lo encuentran, será el fin de nuestra raza.

translation.en: Good luck, soldier. I'll buy you some time.
translation.es: Buena suerte, soldado. Te ganaré algo de tiempo.

translation.en: Okay, okay! I'm dead already, man!
Being the overachiever that you are, you managed to get your whole squad killed, Danny.
translation.es: Eres un genio. Lograste que mataran a todo tu escuadrón. Bravo.

translation.en: - Bravo. - Come on, man. Those things sting.
translation.es: Eres un genio. Lograste que mataran a todo tu escuadrón. Bravo. - Esas cosas arden. - ¿Qué cosas? ¿Estas?

translation.en: You know, I wouldn't know. I haven't been hit yet.
translation.es: No sabría decirte. Nunca me ha tocado una.

translation.en: Ow! Okay, you know what? That's too close, man.
- - You could've taken out an eye.
translation.es: Faltó muy poco. Pudiste sacarme un ojo.

translation.en: I got a date tonight, man. This ain't sexy!
translation.es: Tengo una cita esta noche. Esto no es sexi.

translation.en: This weapon is just faulty. Someone is going to get a talking to...
translation.es: Es un arma defectuosa. Alguien la va a pagar.

translation.en: I should've let you die in Grenada.
If you did, we wouldn't be able to come to the forest, run around and play these awesome games.
translation.es: No hubiéramos podido venir al bosque y jugar estos juegos.

translation.en: Wow, man, that hurts. 'Cause I love you.
translation.es: Ay, no. Eso duele, porque te amo.

translation.en: But you refuse to let it in 'cause you got intimacy issues.
translation.es: Pero te niegas a recibir amor. Tienes problemas de intimidad.

translation.en: A therapist will probably tell you you weren't hugged enough as a kid.
translation.es: Un terapeuta diría que no te abrazaron mucho de niño.

translation.en: - Look, man. - Danny, I know I look stupid, but...
translation.es: - Mira, hombre. - Sé que parezco estúpido, pero...

translation.en: I need medical up here now.
We have a projectile strike in the northwest corner of the training course.
translation.es: Nos lanzaron proyectiles a la esquina noroeste del campo de entrenamiento.

translation.en: And would someone please explain to me why you dropped napalm on your own guys!
translation.es: Explíquenme, ¿por qué les lanzaron napalm a sus propios hombres?

translation.en: Negative. There are no live army drills in the northwest sector.
translation.es: Negativo. No hay simulacros con explosivos en el sector noroeste.

translation.en: What the hell hit us, then?
I need all of you to fan out and track that thing down now!
translation.es: ¡Dispérsense y localicen esa cosa ahora mismo!

translation.en: Get down there now and flush that thing out!
It's going for the mine! Cut it off!
I don't want to hurt anyone.
Who called in the Air Force?
Did you think you could hide?
Tell me where your friends are hiding.
translation.es: Dime dónde se esconden tus amigos.

translation.en: as a member of the Autobot resistance,
translation.es: como miembro de la resistencia autobot,

translation.en: you are a traitor to Cybertron
Wha-- Are those your diving trophies?
Taking up too much space in my room.
translation.es: Ocupan mucho espacio en mi cuarto.
Te vas a arrepentir de hacer eso.

translation.en: Breakfast is conveniently located in the cupboards and the fridge.
translation.es: Está convenientemente ubicado en las alacenas y el refri.

translation.en: - Ah. - Try to help out... - Yeah. - ...a little.
Since I'm such a big kid now, making my own breakfast and what have you.
translation.es: Ahora que soy grande y me preparo el desayuno,

translation.en: You know how I could be an even bigger help around here, Mom?
What do you know, it's my birthday tomorrow, perfect timing for a large cash gift.
translation.es: Mañana es mi cumpleaños, momento perfecto para un regalo en efectivo.

translation.en: You know, $500 is really all I need to finish the Corvette.
translation.es: Solo necesito 500 dólares para acabar de arreglar el Corvette.

translation.en: I don't have $500. You know how much nurses make.
translation.es: No tengo 500 dólares. Tú sabes cuánto ganan las enfermeras.

translation.en: Half as much as doctors for twice the work, right?
translation.es: La mitad que los médicos por el doble de trabajo, ¿no?

translation.en: I got another job interview tomorrow. If all goes well, I'll have you swimming in car parts.
translation.es: Tengo otra entrevista mañana. Si todo sale bien, tendrás repuestos de sobra.

translation.en: Don't be rude. Feed the dog.
translation.es: No seas grosera. Dale de comer al perro.

translation.en: Conan is Otis's dog. Make him do it.
translation.es: Conan es el perro de Otis. Que lo haga él.

translation.en: Aw! You look so grown up in your karate suit.
translation.es: Te ves muy maduro con tu uniforme de karate.

translation.en: My baby boy is becoming a man.
translation.es: Mi bebé se está convirtiendo en un hombre.

translation.en: Oh, shoot, I'm gonna be late.
Can you drop your brother at karate on your way to work, please?
translation.es: ¿Puedes dejar a tu hermano en karate de camino a tu trabajo?

translation.en: Um, I could if I had a car.
Just let him follow you on your bike so nobody abducts him.
translation.es: Deja que te siga en tu moto para que nadie lo rapte.

translation.en: Abducts him? You just said he's a grown man now.
translation.es: ¿Lo rapte? Acabas de decir que ya es un hombre.

translation.en: If anyone tries anything, I will rupture their freaking spleen.
translation.es: Si alguien intenta algo, le romperé el maldito bazo.

translation.en: - That's two for you guys. - Thanks, bro.
All right. Have a good one.
Excuse me. Hi. We've never actually met... Sorry, I can't right now.
translation.es: - Perdón, no nos conocemos... - Disculpa, ahora no puedo.

translation.en: If I had to wear that, I would pray to be fired.
translation.es: Si tuviera que ponerme eso, rezaría para que me despidieran.

translation.en: ♪ A touch of sable In their eyes ♪
Are you still working on that damn car?
You still working on that damn personality?
- What have you got for me? - Whatever you want.
translation.es: - ¿Tienes algo para mí? - Lo que tú quieras.

translation.en: Russians are gonna blow us all to hell anyway.
translation.es: Los rusos nos van a hacer polvo de todas maneras.

translation.en: Hand me the three- eighths, would you?
- You working on the carburetor? - Mmm- hmm.
- You need the half- inch. - I said the three...
translation.es: - Necesitas la de 12 mm. - Dije de 19...

translation.en: He survived the fall of Cybertron.
translation.es: Sobrevivió a la caída de Cybertron.

translation.en: And no rebellion is truly dead until the leader is vanquished.
translation.es: Ninguna rebelión muere de verdad hasta que se vence al líder.

translation.en: My name is Cliffjumper, lieutenant in the Autobot resistance.
translation.es: Mi nombre es Cliffjumper, teniente de la resistencia autobot.

translation.en: - My safe return will be considered... -
translation.es: Mi regreso a salvo se considerará...

translation.en: We know he's planning to establish a base.
translation.es: Sabemos que quiere instalar una base.

translation.en: Tell us where it is and we'll let you live.
translation.es: Dinos dónde está y te dejaremos vivir.

translation.en: Can you trace it? Already did.
If you won't tell us where Prime is, perhaps your young friend will.
translation.es: Si no nos dices dónde está Prime, quizá tu joven amigo sí.

translation.en: You're a brave warrior. You deserve a better death.
translation.es: Eres un guerrero valiente. Mereces una muerte mejor.

translation.en: I'll give you thirty bucks for all of it.
I can get twice that much for the coil alone.
translation.es: Me darían el doble solo por la bobina.

translation.en: From who? I'm the only one that comes in here.
translation.es: ¿Quién te lo daría? Soy la única que entra aquí.

translation.en: I don't even know how you're still open.
translation.es: No sé cómo esto sigue abierto.

translation.en: Just take it. Go. My show is on.
translation.es: Llévatelo y vete. Ya empezó mi programa.

translation.en: Hey, where did you get that Beetle?
I swear to God, ever since they put up that dumbass tower,
translation.es: Te juro que desde que pusieron esa estúpida torre,

translation.en: I can't get a signal to watch my shows.
translation.es: no consigo señal para mis programas.

translation.en: I've got to see what happens to Alf this week.
translation.es: Quiero saber qué le pasa a Alf esta semana.

translation.en: I can't do this without you.
Nice to meet you. Interested in a new Buick?
All right, I touched. But I didn't eat.
And I'm supposed to believe one of these steaks
translation.es: ¿Y debo creer que uno de estos bistecs

translation.en: just got up and walked away on its own?
translation.es: se levantó y se fue caminando solo?

translation.en: Well, I did eat that pumpkin.
translation.es: Bueno, sí me comí la calabaza.

translation.en: I think it's too low, honey.
No. No, I think it goes to that button.
translation.es: No, tiene que llegar a ese botón.

translation.en: I don't know about... Fix it.
I love you. Come on, open your present. I'm gonna be late for work.
translation.es: Te quiero. Abre tu regalo. Voy a llegar tarde al trabajo.

translation.en: So, I keep hearing about people on mopeds
translation.es: He oído de personas en mopeds a las que atropellan

translation.en: getting run over and their brains smashed in.
translation.es: de personas en mopeds a las que atropellan y aplastan sus cerebros.

translation.en: You got to wear this from now on.
translation.es: Tienes que usarlo de ahora en adelante.

translation.en: I don't care if it's not the law. It's our law.
translation.es: No me importa que no sea una ley. Es nuestra ley.

translation.en: Plus, look how cute it is.
I actually got you a little gift, too, Charlie.
translation.es: Yo también te compré un regalito.

translation.en: I mean, it's small, but, it's from the heart.
translation.es: Es algo pequeño, pero de corazón.

translation.en: A smile is a powerful thing.
It says to the world, I'm fun and approachable.
translation.es: Le dice al mundo: Soy divertida y amigable.

translation.en: You know, there's a whole chapter in here about how people who smile more often
translation.es: Un capítulo explica cómo las personas que sonríen mucho

translation.en: I really think it's gonna change your whole outlook if you smile more often.
translation.es: Creo que toda tu vida cambiará si sonríes más.

translation.en: - What? - The yellow Beetle, I want it.
I'll make you a deal. If I get that thing started, it's mine.
translation.es: Hagamos un trato: si logro que arranque, es mío.

translation.en: That's no deal. That's just you taking my car.
translation.es: Eso no es un trato. Me robas mi auto.

translation.en: If I get it started, I keep it and I work here every day for a year!
translation.es: Si logro que arranque, me lo quedo y trabajo aquí todos los días por un año.

translation.en: I'll scrub the grease off the floors, okay?
translation.es: Limpiaré la grasa de los pisos.

translation.en: I will pick up and organize every scrap of paper in this place.
translation.es: Levantaré y organizaré todos los papeles de este lugar.

translation.en: I'll even detail your horrible, disgusting toilets.
translation.es: Hasta limpiaré todos tus asquerosos inodoros.
Te lo regalo, niña. Feliz cumpleaños.

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, thank you!
Oh, my God, thank you so much! I love you!
That thing ain't even safe to drive. It's a deathtrap.
translation.es: - Esa cosa no es segura. - Es una trampa mortal.

translation.en: Nothing! I'm fine. Mom, you should go back to bed.
translation.es: ¡Nada! Estoy bien. Vuelve a la cama. Todo está bien.

translation.en: Everything's fine. - What the hell is that? - Um, it's...
What is that car doing in our garage?
translation.es: ¿Qué hace ese auto en nuestra cochera?

translation.en: Uncle Hank gave it to me.
translation.es: El tío Hank me lo regaló.

translation.en: I wish you would've told me before you brought it home.
translation.es: Ojalá me hubieras avisado antes de traerlo a casa.

translation.en: Um, I'm in the middle of some stuff, Mom.
Okay, I'll get out of your hair, but...
- It really runs? - Yeah, it really runs.

translation.es: Estoy un poco nerviosa. Lo siento.

translation.en: You don't know or you don't have a name?
You sound like a little bumblebee.
I'm gonna call you that from now on.
translation.es: Te voy a llamar así de ahora en adelante.
Combina con lo que traes puesto.

translation.en: - Come on, Amber. - Give me one good reason.
You tried to sleep with my sister!
That down payment was for a house. You bought a car.
translation.es: Ese pago inicial era para una casa. Compraste un auto.

translation.en: How stupid are you, Roy? We don't need a car. God!
translation.es: ¿Qué tan estúpido eres? ¡No necesitamos un auto!

translation.en: Now, just settle down for one second and hear me out.
- What the hell is that? - What?
Oh, God, Roy, that thing is coming right for us!
Not my car. Not my car.
translation.es: No en mi auto. ¡No en mi auto!

translation.en: Please, God, no, not my car!
Oh, that's good, baby. That's good.
translation.es: Menos mal, mi amor. Menos mal.

translation.en: The indigenous life is even more primitive than I expected.
translation.es: Los habitantes son más primitivos de lo que me esperaba.

translation.en: Hmm. I like the way they pop.
B- 127's distress signal came from the western coast of this continent.
translation.es: La señal de B-127 vino de la costa oeste del continente.

translation.en: When do they start letting you use nunchucks?
I don't know, but I hope soon.
- Morning! See you guys later. - Where you off to so fast?
translation.es: - Buenos días. Hasta luego. - ¿Adónde vas con tanta prisa?
A ningún lado. Que tengan buen día.

translation.en: - Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God. -
No, have you seen my car today?
It was in the garage. Someone stole it!
translation.es: ¡Estaba en la cochera! ¡Alguien se lo robó!
No, idiota. Se lo llevó mamá.

translation.en: - - She had to bring Conan to the vet because he swallowed, like, a rubber glove or something
translation.es: Llevó a Conan al veterinario porque se tragó un guante o algo.

translation.en: and Ron needed the station wagon.
Hi. Excuse me. It's me again.
- We never officially met, but... - I can't right now. Sorry.
translation.es: - No nos conocemos, pero... - No puedo ahora. Disculpa.

translation.en: I know, buddy. Hang in there.
You can't eat everything you see.
translation.es: No puedes comer todo lo que ves.

translation.en: Just let this be a good life lesson for you.
translation.es: Que esta sea una buena lección.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Stop it! Don't do that!
Jesus! Charlie, what are you doing?
- What the hell is going on? - Just pull the car over.
Would you put that robot junk away? What are you thinking?
translation.es: ¿Quieres guardar esa chatarra de robot? ¿Cómo se te ocurre?

translation.en: You almost gave me a heart attack.
translation.es: Por poco me causas un infarto. Pensé que querían robarme el auto.

translation.en: I thought I was being carjacked. I'm taking the dog to the vet.
translation.es: Por poco me causas un infarto. Pensé que querían robarme el auto. Voy a llevar al perro al veterinario.

translation.en: I can't believe you would take him without me.
translation.es: ¡No puedo creer que lo lleves sin mí!

translation.en: Mom, I'm so worried about him!
He's my dog, too, you know.
What happened to Conan being Otis's dog?
translation.es: ¿Y eso de que solo era el perro de Otis?

translation.en: You should not be driving in such an emotional state.
translation.es: No deberías manejar en ese estado emocional.

translation.en: I know how you get during emergencies.
translation.es: Sé cómo te pones en emergencias.

translation.en: Oh, okay. I'm happy for you to drive.
You weren't wearing your helmet, by the way. - I saw that. - Oh, shoot.
translation.es: No estabas usando el casco, por cierto. Me di cuenta.

translation.en: Sir. I thought you'd want to see this immediately.
translation.es: Pensé que querría ver esto de inmediato.

translation.en: Two of them just made contact in Texas.
translation.es: Dos de ellos acaban de hacer contacto en Texas.

translation.en: Intel says they're heading west fast.
translation.es: Se dirigen rápido hacia el oeste.

translation.en: Okay, Bee, we need to go over a few things.
translation.es: Muy bien. Hay que repasar algunas cosas.

translation.en: All right.  I'm re- thinking the beach.
translation.es: Estoy reconsiderando lo de la playa.

translation.en: People can be terrible about things they don't understand.
translation.es: La gente puede ser cruel cuando hay algo que no entiende.

translation.en: If they find you, they'll probably lock you up in a lab somewhere and cut you into tiny little pieces.
translation.es: Si te encuentran, te encerrarán en un laboratorio y te cortarán en pedazos.

translation.en: The only person you can show yourself around is me, okay?
translation.es: Solo puedes revelar tu identidad conmigo. ¿Sí?

translation.en: If you see anyone besides me, what do you do?
translation.es: Si ves a alguien además de mí, ¿qué haces?

translation.en: Okay, so let's say we're driving and all of a sudden...
translation.es: Digamos que vamos manejando y de repente:

translation.en: Oh, shoot! Somebody's here! Hide, Bee, hide!
Bee, it's too late. You're already dead.
translation.es: Es demasiado tarde. Ya estás muerto.

translation.en: That's why we're practicing. You'll get it.
translation.es: Por eso estamos practicando. Vas a entender.

translation.en: Fox- 2 on approach. Non- biologicals are inbound.
translation.es: Fox-2, llegando. Los no biológicos se están acercando.

translation.en: The goal, sir, should be to communicate with them.
translation.es: La meta debería ser comunicarnos con ellos.

translation.en: First contact with an alien species.
translation.es: Primer contacto con una especie alienígena.

translation.en: I've spent my whole life waiting for this moment.
translation.es: Llevo toda mi vida esperando este momento.

translation.en: If they make one wrong move, we put 'em down.
translation.es: Si hacen un movimiento equivocado, los destruimos.

translation.en: The humans are multiplying. Please let me kill them.
translation.es: Los humanos se están multiplicando. Por favor, déjeme matarlos.

translation.en: Not yet. B- 127's signal has gone silent.
translation.es: Todavía no. La señal de B-127 desapareció.

translation.en: Listen up! I'm Agent Burns and this is... Dr. Powell.
translation.es: Escuchen. Soy el agente Burns y él es el Dr. Powell.

translation.en: We currently have 100 guns pointed right at your head!
translation.es: Actualmente tenemos 100 armas apuntándoles a la cabeza.

translation.en: we are Decepticon peacekeepers patrolling the galaxy.
translation.es: somos fuerzas decépticons de la paz. Patrullamos la galaxia.

translation.en: We believe a dangerous criminal from our world
translation.es: Creemos que un peligroso criminal de nuestro mundo
se esconde en algún lugar del suyo.

translation.en: How is it you think we can help?
You want access to our satellites?

translation.es: Nuestros escáneres tienen un rango limitado.

translation.en: But combined, they could be quite powerful.
translation.es: Pero si los combinamos, podrían ser muy poderosos.

translation.en: No way! Out of the question!
We have a common enemy, Agent Burns.
translation.es: Tenemos un enemigo en común, agente Burns.

translation.en: There's a war raging on our planet.
translation.es: Hay una guerra en nuestro planeta.

translation.en: If B- 127 isn't found, that war may find its way here.
translation.es: Si no encontramos a B-127, esa guerra podría extenderse hasta acá.

translation.en: We can find a way to help one another.
We'll talk it over with our superiors.
In the meantime, if you could follow us.
Must suck being cooped up in a VW all day, huh?
translation.es: Debe ser feo estar encerrado en un Volkswagen todo el día.

translation.en: Is there anyone that can help you?
You know, like a mom, dad, siblings? You all love each other?
translation.es: ¿Un papá, una mamá, hermanos? ¿Que se aman entre ustedes?

translation.en: Or drive each other crazy and you can't wait to get away and start a whole new life.
translation.es: ¿O que se vuelven locos y se mueren por irse y empezar una nueva vida?

translation.en: Do you want me to see if I can fix it?

translation.es: Lo haré con cuidado, te lo prometo.

translation.en: B- 127, I pray this message finds you.
translation.es: B-127, ruego para que este mensaje te encuentre.

translation.en: That voice said something about a-- a war.
translation.es: Esa voz dijo algo sobre... ¿una guerra?

translation.en: Is the VW Beetle some kind off... disguise?
translation.es: ¿El Beetle es una especie de... disfraz?

translation.en: - And a criminal. - All right, I'm almost done.
translation.es: - y un criminal. - Ya casi acabo.

translation.en: No way. Are you actually watching it?
translation.es: No puede ser. ¿En serio estás viendo eso?

translation.en: You can pop in another one if you want.
This is Charlie Watson, future Olympic gold medalist.
translation.es: Ella es Charlie Watson, futura medallista de oro olímpica.

translation.en: - Thanks, Dad. - How do you feel?
No, no, why would you play this?
Let's see if we got something.
You know, Bee, music can help you say what you're feeling.
translation.es: La música puede ayudarte a expresar lo que sientes.

translation.en: You're gonna love this. It's brand new.
translation.es: Este te va a encantar. Es nuevo.
No eres fan de The Smiths.

translation.en: Hey, hey, please don't touch those. Please.
translation.es: Por favor, no toques esos discos.

translation.en: Do you want to hear it?
We used to listen to this while we'd work on the Corvette.
translation.es: Escuchábamos esto cuando trabajábamos en el Corvette.

translation.en: He used to say it would make the car feel better.
translation.es: Decía que hacía que el auto se sintiera mejor.

translation.en: We used to work on this car every weekend together.
translation.es: Trabajábamos en este auto los fines de semana juntos.

translation.en: That was the last time I saw him.
translation.es: Esa fue la última vez que lo vi.

translation.en: He died of a heart attack.
translation.es: Murió de un ataque al corazón.

translation.en: I never got to say goodbye.
You know, I always thought if I could just...
translation.es: Siempre pensé que si tan solo pudiera...

translation.en: If I could just get it to start up again,
translation.es: si pudiera hacerlo arrancar de nuevo...

translation.en: I say this with all due respect.
translation.es: Le digo esto con todo respeto:

translation.en: Have you lost your damn mind?
That was with all due respect?  The man's got a point, Doctor.
translation.es: - ¿Eso fue con todo respeto? - Él tiene razón, doctor.

translation.en: Our satellite network is at the forefront of our national defense.
translation.es: Nuestros satélites están a la vanguardia de la defensa nacional.

translation.en: It could be a once in a lifetime opportunity.
translation.es: Podría ser una oportunidad única en la vida.

translation.en: Can you imagine the advances an alliance with these creatures might bring?
translation.es: ¿Se imagina los avances que una alianza con esas criaturas podría brindarnos?

translation.en: I imagine the advances. An advance on Washington.
translation.es: Me imagino los avances. Avances sobre Washington.

translation.en: - New York. An advance on Chicago! - That's not gonna happen.
translation.es: - Nueva York. ¡Avances sobre Chicago! - Eso no va a pasar.

translation.en: They literally call themselves Decepticons. That doesn't set off any red flags?
translation.es: Literalmente se llaman decépticons. ¿No es para alarmarse?

translation.en: we're talking about the most advanced robotic system ever seen.
translation.es: Estamos hablando del sistema robótico más avanzado jamás visto.

translation.en: they'll just take their technology to the Russians instead.
translation.es: les ofrecerán su tecnología a los rusos.

translation.en: Do you really want to go down in history as the man who cost us the Cold War?
translation.es: ¿Quiere ser el hombre que nos haya hecho perder la guerra fría?

translation.en: We'll help them find their fugitive.
translation.es: Los ayudaremos a encontrar a su fugitivo.

translation.en: you can do all the experiments you want. Hmm?
translation.es: podrá hacer todos los experimentos que quiera.
OPERACIONES ESPECIALES DE EE. UU. Queridos... robots.

translation.en: How kind of you to finally allow us in.
translation.es: Qué amables de por fin dejarnos entrar.

translation.en: We're very happy to have you here as friends.
translation.es: Nos da gusto hospedarlos aquí. Como amigos.

translation.en: My superior has agreed to grant you limited access to our satellites.
translation.es: Mi superior accedió a darles acceso limitado a nuestros satélites.

translation.en: In addition, you're welcome to use

translation.es: toda la tecnología que tenemos aquí.

translation.en: It's the largest super- array of Crays on Earth.
translation.es: Es la red más grande de Crays en la Tierra.

translation.en: We thank you for your hospitality.
Tell me, those vocal communication devices you use,
translation.es: Dígame, esos dispositivos de comunicación vocal que usan,

translation.en: You got to pick a station, man. I know there's a lot of choices.
translation.es: Tienes que escoger una estación. Sé que hay muchas opciones.

translation.en: You want to go on a date with me, maybe?
What are you trying to do?
Here we go. Here we go. You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd.
translation.es: Allá vamos. No eres un nerd. No eres un nerd.

translation.en: Okay, you're a nerd, but just don't let her see that you're nerdy.
translation.es: Bueno, sí eres un nerd. No dejes que ella se dé cuenta.

translation.en: Excuse me. Sorry to barge in. I just...
Just sit down, please? Shh, don't scream, okay?
It's okay, okay? Just breathe. Breathe.
Look, I know what you saw was a little crazy. I can explain.
translation.es: Lo que viste es un poco raro. Te lo puedo explicar.

translation.en: Yeah, I can't explain. But here's the deal.
If you tell anyone what you just saw,
translation.es: Si le dices a alguien lo que acabas de ver,

translation.en: I'm gonna have to run you over with my car.
translation.es: tendré que atropellarte con mi auto.

translation.en: I don't mean that in a mean way. Okay? What I'm saying
translation.es: No lo dije con mala intención. Quiero decir

translation.en: is no one can know what you just saw, okay?
translation.es: que nadie puede saber lo que acabas de ver.

translation.en: Bumblebee, you can... you can come out now.
He's been going up and down on that dial all day today and I don't know why.
translation.es: Ha estado cambiando la estación todo el día y no sé por qué.

translation.en: - Hey, check out his reflexes. - What?
- Yo, give me your shirt. - Huh?
You mean the shirt that I'm wearing? Yes, yes! Come on. I'll give it back to you. Okay.
translation.es: - ¿La que traigo puesta? Bueno. - Sí. Te la voy a devolver.

translation.en: Come on! Give me your shirt!
Wait, wait, wait! Hey, no, no! You don't need to do this.
- Come here. Come on! - No, I get it. I get it!
I know I promised you, but, yeah, you're not getting that back.
translation.es: Sé que lo prometí, pero no te la voy a devolver.
Están combinando nuestra tecnología sin ningún problema.

translation.en: They're creating an interconnected web of information.
translation.es: Están creando una red interconectada de información.

translation.en: Volumes of data at their fingertips.
translation.es: Miles de datos al alcance de la mano.

translation.en: He's a weird guy. You ever notice that about Powell?
translation.es: Es un tipo muy raro. ¿Sabía que Powell era raro?

translation.en: They're tracking fluctuations in Energon levels.
translation.es: Están rastreando los cambios en niveles de Energón.

translation.en: It's like a heat signature specific to their species.
translation.es: Es como una huella térmica de su especie.

translation.en: You've given them our satellites, our comms, God knows what else.
translation.es: Les ha dado nuestros satélites, nuestras comunicaciones, quién sabe qué más.

translation.en: Yet, in the space of a day they've given us a way
translation.es: Pero en apenas un día, ellos nos han dado la forma

translation.en: to not only hunt down B- 127,
translation.es: de buscar no solo a B-127,

translation.en: Let them finish what they're doing. Let them find B- 127.
translation.es: Que terminen lo que están haciendo, que encuentren a B-127.

translation.en: And then I'll give you permission to destroy them all.
translation.es: Luego te daré permiso de destruirlos a todos.

translation.en: So you have no idea where he came from?
You thought about calling the cops?
What are they gonna do, Memo?
They're just gonna send him away to a lab and do weird science experiments on him.
translation.es: Solo enviarlo a un laboratorio y hacerle experimentos de ciencia loca.

translation.en: You're getting pretty good with that radio dial, Bee.
translation.es: Te estás volviendo bueno con ese radio.

translation.en: Yeah, D.J. Bumble in the house!
Is that why you're always messing with the dial?
translation.es: ¿Por eso siempre andas cambiando la estación?

translation.en: You're trying to teach yourself how to talk, aren't you?
Oh, my God, Bee, you're a genius! You're an actual genius! ♪ Hit it! ♪
translation.es: ¡Ay, eres un genio! ¡Eres un verdadero genio!

translation.en: - What is going on here? - That's Jim from sixth period.
translation.es: - ¿Qué está pasando aquí? - Es Jim de la escuela.

translation.en: He said he was busy this week.
translation.es: Dijo que iba a estar ocupado esta semana.

translation.en: You want to check it out?
Hey, everybody, come watch! Tripp's gonna jump!
- You're off your nut. - What's going on over there?
translation.es: ¡Vengan a ver! ¡Tripp va a saltar! - ¿Qué está pasando allá? - ¡Estás loco!

translation.en: Don't do it, dude, you're crazy.
Come on, it's not that big a jump.
translation.es: No es un salto tan grande.

translation.en: I mean, yeah. I spilled a gallon of lemonade on him once.
translation.es: Le derramé encima cuatro litros de limonada una vez.

translation.en: Doesn't anyone have the balls to jump off this thing with me?
translation.es: ¿Nadie tiene las pelotas para saltar conmigo?

translation.en: Yeah, I-- See, I didn't-- I didn't do that. I didn't actually--
Uh... No, sorry about that. It...
You were on the dive team with my little sister.
translation.es: Estabas en el equipo de clavados con mi hermana menor.

translation.en: I saw you win state a couple years ago.
translation.es: Te vi ganar la estatal hace unos años.

translation.en: - Oh. Uh, yeah. - Ladies and gentlemen.
This just got a whole lot more interesting.
translation.es: Esto se puso mucho más interesante.

translation.en: We have a championship high- diver on our hands!
Yeah, I actually, I don't, I don't... I don't do it anymore.
translation.es: En realidad, ya no... Ya no hago clavados.

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. I won't make you go first.
translation.es: No haré que te eches primero.

translation.en: Dive Girl! You better not back out on me.
translation.es: ¡Niña clavadista! ¡Más vale que no te arrepientas!

translation.en: You guys, she's gonna do it! She's gonna do it!
- Where you going? - What, are you scared?
What a loser!  Thought you said you were on the diving team.
translation.es: - ¡Qué perdedora! - ¿No estabas en un equipo de clavados?

translation.en: I think she's gonna cry in her car.
- That was your big moment to look cool. -
translation.es: Era tu gran momento para mostrar que eres genial.
¿Dónde está tu red para el pelo?

translation.en: It's in the garbage, Einstein. You throw them away after each use.
translation.es: Está en la basura, Einstein. Se tiran después de usarlas.

translation.en: You should have your dad buy you a better one.
translation.es: Deberías pedirle a tu papá que te compre otro.

translation.en: But I think I know something that'll make you feel better.
translation.es: Sé de algo que te hará sentir mejor.

translation.en: What about you, Bee? Want some revenge?
Come on. I got an idea.

translation.es: Esa es la casa de Tina.

translation.en: You use it for when you...
- No, no, no, no. You've got... -
Okay, look, Bee, you be our egg man.
translation.es: Bee, vas a ser el de los huevos, ¿sí?

translation.en: - You see these right here? - Mmm- hmm.
You grab one of these, like so.
And that right there, that's your target. That's right.
translation.es: ¿Y eso que está allá? Ese es tu objetivo.

translation.en: I think we could just hand it to him... He could maybe, yeah, and then...
My heart right now is going crazy. - - Uh- oh!
translation.es: Mi corazón se está volviendo loco.

translation.en: - Oh, God. - Stop the car, please.
translation.es: - Ay, no. - Para el auto, por favor.

translation.en: Bee, what are you doing? What are you doing?
Oh, my God, we're committing a felony!
We got a yellow vehicle driving its damn self through the Pico Tunnel.
translation.es: ¡Hay un vehículo manejando sin conductor por el túnel de la Pico!

translation.en: Morning, buddy. I got to go to work, okay?
translation.es: Buenos días, amigo. Tengo que ir a trabajar, ¿sí?

translation.en: Bee. Listen to me. You need to stay in this garage, okay?
translation.es: Bee. Escucha. Tienes que quedarte en esta cochera.

translation.en: After what happened last night, I'm pretty sure the cops are looking for you,
translation.es: Después de lo que pasó anoche, la policía debe estar buscándote

translation.en: and, uh, you don't exactly blend in.
translation.es: Después de lo que pasó anoche, la policía debe estar buscándote y no pasas desapercibido.

translation.en: You can have my Pop- Tart.
I need you to go to the frozen banana stand and steal some sticks.
translation.es: Ve al puesto de plátanos congelados y roba unos palitos.
HOT DOG EN PALITO Se nos acabaron.

translation.en: Can't we just sell the hot dogs without the sticks?
translation.es: ¿No podemos vender los hot dogs sin los palitos?

translation.en: What's happening here? We got a hit, I think. Where's that location?
translation.es: - ¿Qué está pasando aquí? - Creo que lo ubicamos. ¿Dónde es?

translation.en: Near San Francisco. A coastal town named Brighton Falls.
translation.es: Cerca de San Francisco. Un pueblo llamado Brighton Falls.

translation.en: You got to come home right now.
translation.es: Tienes que volver a casa ahora mismo.

translation.en: It's bad. It's really, really bad.
translation.es: Es grave. Es muy, muy grave.
Bumblebee. ¿Qué hiciste? ¿Cómo se te ocurrió hacer esto?
¿Qué hiciste? ¿Cómo se te ocurrió hacer esto?

translation.en: I told you to hide in the garage!
translation.es: ¡Te dije que te escondieras en la cochera!
Tu vergüenza nos va a ser muy útil.

translation.en: I'm not mad, okay? This is all my fault.
translation.es: No estoy enojada. Todo esto es culpa mía.

translation.en: I never should have left you.
Hey, okay, maybe don't transform all the way?
translation.es: ¿Y si no te transformas por completo?

translation.en: We've still got to get you through the door.
translation.es: Aún tenemos que sacarte por la puerta.

translation.en: And now you're crippled for life.
translation.es: Y ahora estás lisiada de por vida.
Mi amor, cuidado con mi cabello.

translation.en: I'm sorry. This is all my fault.
translation.es: Perdóname. Todo esto es culpa mía.

translation.en: What'd you do to my TV?
Look, Mom, I can explain. We will talk about this later, all right?
translation.es: Puedo explicártelo. Hablaremos de esto más tarde.

translation.en: - Now, I have to go. - Are you kidding me?

translation.es: No. No vas a ir a ningún lado.

translation.en: It's about my car. It's really important. About your car?
translation.es: - Es por mi auto. Es superimportante. - ¿Por tu auto?

translation.en: That you spend all day and night shut in that garage, doing God- knows- what with?
translation.es: ¿Con el que pasas noche y día en la cochera haciendo quién sabe qué?

translation.en: Mom, I can't. I really can't right now.
translation.es: Mamá, no puedo. No puedo ahora.

translation.en: Oh, no, you really can, Charlie.
Your attitude, your always sulking around.
translation.es: Tu actitud. Siempre estás de malas.

translation.en: You brought home that piece of crap without even asking me!
translation.es: Trajiste ese pedazo de chatarra sin pedirme permiso.

translation.en: Everyone in this family is trying to be happy,
translation.es: Todos en esta familia tratan de ser felices

translation.en: and all you want to do is make things harder.
translation.es: y tú solo quieres complicarlo todo.

translation.en: You know, Mom, just because you've moved on and you're happy with your new life doesn't mean I have!
translation.es: ¡El que tú hayas seguido adelante y seas feliz no significa que yo también!

translation.en: You've found a replacement for my dad and I haven't, okay, and I never will!
translation.es: ¡Encontraste un sustituto para papá y yo no, y nunca lo encontraré!

translation.en: So, I'm sorry if that makes things harder,
translation.es: Perdón si eso te complica las cosas, pero ¡en diez meses,

translation.en: but in ten months from now
translation.es: Perdón si eso te complica las cosas, pero ¡en diez meses, ya no tendrás que lidiar conmigo!

translation.en: you won't even have to deal with me!
translation.es: ya no tendrás que lidiar conmigo!

translation.en: I just feel like ever since my dad died, I've become this drain on everyone, and I hate it.
translation.es: Desde que murió mi papá, me he convertido en una carga y lo odio.

translation.en: It's like everybody expects me to act like nothing ever happened, and...
translation.es: Todo el mundo espera que actúe como si nada hubiera pasado y...

translation.en: About your dad... I'm really sorry.
translation.es: Respecto a tu papá... de verdad lo siento.

translation.en: You know, there's... there's this quote that I like.
translation.es: Hay una cita que me gusta...

translation.en: The darkest nights produce the brightest stars.
translation.es: Las noches más oscuras producen las estrellas más brillantes.

translation.en: My mom got it from Weight Watchers.
translation.es: Mi mamá la oyó en Weight Watchers.

translation.en: Get out and move away from the vehicle.
- Weapons now! Take it down! - Run!
No, don't run. Do not run!
Please tell me they're on our side.
translation.es: Dime que están de nuestro lado.

translation.en: B- 127, you're a traitor and a coward.
translation.es: B-127, eres un traidor y un cobarde.

translation.en: Tell us where Optimus Prime is hiding.
translation.es: Dinos dónde se esconde Optimus Prime.

translation.en: Your daughter stole government property, Mrs. Watson.
translation.es: Su hija robó propiedad del gobierno.
Le está costando trabajo adaptarse, pero...

translation.en: but we had no idea it was this serious.
translation.es: no sabíamos que fuera tan serio. Yo...

translation.en: I didn't steal anything, and he doesn't belong to them.
translation.es: Yo no robé nada, y él no les pertenece.

translation.en: I can assure you that it is an it.
translation.es: Le aseguro que eso es una cosa.

translation.en: And it is a highly dangerous war machine.
translation.es: Eso es una peligrosa máquina de guerra.

translation.en: No, he isn't, okay, Mom? He's not some war machine.
translation.es: No es verdad, mamá. No es una máquina de guerra.

translation.en: I-- I don't know what he is, but...
Ma'am, your daughter's had a traumatic experience today.
translation.es: Su hija tuvo una experiencia traumática hoy.

translation.en: Maybe doesn't understand everything she's seen.
translation.es: Quizá no comprenda todo lo que ha visto.

translation.en: No, I'm fine, Mom. I'm completely fine, okay?
translation.es: No, estoy bien, mamá. Estoy perfectamente.

translation.en: You have to believe me, please. I didn't steal anything!
translation.es: Me tienes que creer. ¡Yo no robé nada!

translation.en: Stop! Just go to your room.
When I was going through puberty,
- Stole a box of Mallomars once. - Yeah, we know.
translation.es: - Robé una caja de galletas una vez. - Sí, lo sabemos.
A mamá le va a encantar esto.

translation.en: Look, Otis, you need to go home and...
translation.es: Tienes que irte a casa y...

translation.en: No, Otis, stop it! - Why would you do that? -
Let go of me! - You're touching my buttocks! -
I will tell you a secret if you shut up.
translation.es: Te diré un secreto si te callas.

translation.en: Okay, so, um, this is my room.

translation.es: cuarto. Siéntanse como en su casa.

translation.en: These are actually my sister's stuff.
translation.es: Estas son cosas de mi hermana.

translation.en: She likes playing pranks, like putting her stuff over here.
translation.es: Le gusta hacer bromas, como poner sus cosas aquí.

translation.en: - Can I, uh, sit down? - Yeah, yeah. Mmm- hmm.
Residents of Brighton Falls have been witness to an unusual sight this evening.
translation.es: Los residentes de Brighton Falls han presenciado un evento inusual.

translation.en: Armed Forces pouring into town as part of what we are told
translation.es: Fuerzas armadas llegaron a la ciudad como parte de lo que nos dicen
que es un ejercicio militar de rutina.

translation.en: setting up camp at our own McKinnon Air Base.
translation.es: Establecen un campamento en nuestra base aérea McKinnon.

translation.en: If Bumblebee's still alive, that's where they're keeping him.
translation.es: Si Bumblebee sigue vivo, ahí es donde lo tienen.

translation.en: We have to go. We have to try and save him.
translation.es: Tenemos que ir. Tenemos que intentar salvarlo.

translation.en: Count me in. I'll take point.
translation.es: Cuenten conmigo. Me pondré al frente.

translation.en: - But I can help. Master Larry says I-- - I need someone here.
translation.es: - Puedo ayudar. El maestro Larry dice... - Necesito a alguien aquí.

translation.en: to make sure that Mom and Ron don't know that I'm gone.
translation.es: para asegurarnos de que mamá y Ron no sepan que me fui.

translation.en: Tell us where Optimus Prime and the rebels are hiding,
translation.es: Dinos dónde se esconden Optimus Prime y los rebeldes,

translation.en: and we can end this war.
translation.es: y podremos terminar con esta guerra.

translation.en: This doesn't concern you, human Powell.
translation.es: No es de su incumbencia, humano Powell.

translation.en: Are you sure this is a good idea?
translation.es: ¿Segura que es una buena idea? PELIGRO ALTO VOLTAJE

translation.en: It's a terrible idea, but I've got to try it.
translation.es: Es una pésima idea, pero tengo que intentarlo.

translation.en: You can't get-- Well, why don't you-- Stop, stop, wait...
- How'd you know the power was off? - I didn't. Let's go.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo sabías que no tenía electricidad? - No lo sabía. Vamos.
Sus celdas de memoria están fritas.

translation.en: Regroup, rebuild, and retake our home.
translation.es: Nos reagruparemos, reconstruiremos y retomaremos nuestro hogar.

translation.en: But we must find refuge first.
Once we've gathered the others, we'll join you.
translation.es: Cuando reunamos a los demás, te alcanzaremos.

translation.en: If the Decepticons find it, then our people are truly finished.
translation.es: Si los decépticons lo encuentran, nuestra gente perecerá.

translation.en: This is our chance to wipe out the Autobot resistance for good.
translation.es: Es nuestra oportunidad de acabar con la resistencia autobot para siempre.

translation.en: We'll burn the whole planet to cinders.
We must get word to Cybertron immediately.
translation.es: Tenemos que comunicarnos con Cybertron inmediatamente.

translation.en: Tell them to bring an army.
Burns, we made a terrible mistake.
And thanks to our human allies,
translation.es: Y gracias a nuestros aliados humanos,

translation.en: I know just how to get the message home.
translation.es: sé exactamente cómo enviar el mensaje a casa.
Nos van a matar a todos.

translation.en: Thank you for your hospitality, friend Powell.
translation.es: Gracias por su hospitalidad, amigo Powell.

translation.en: - You have to stop them! - Powell!
What, did she cut the wire to the TV?
Nice! Reel- to- reel still works.
Charlie's fallen ill and must stay in her bedroom for the rest of the evening.
translation.es: Está indispuesta y debe quedarse en su cuarto el resto de la noche.

translation.en: She wishes not to be troubled. Keep clear of her chambers.
translation.es: No quiere que la molesten. Manténganse lejos de sus aposentos.

translation.en: and must stay in her bedroom for the rest of the evening.
translation.es: y debe quedarse en su cuarto el resto de la noche.

translation.en: - Mom, there is no reason to go... - Where is she?
I found a tower to transmit our message.
translation.es: Encontré una torre para transmitir nuestro mensaje.
B-127. Por poco se me olvida.

translation.en: Talk to me, Bee, talk to me.
I can fix this. I can fix this.
You got to wake up, Bee. You got to wake up.
Come on, give me the other one.
I can't lose you, too, Bee.
translation.es: No puedo perderte a ti también.

translation.en: Come on, Bee, we've got to get you out of here.
translation.es: Vámonos. Hay que sacarte de aquí.

translation.en: Charlie, there's like a million guys out there!
translation.es: Charlie, ¡hay un millón de tipos afuera!

translation.en: Come on, Bee, you've gotta get up. Can you get up?
There's a door in my way.
- We got to go. - Bee, come on.
You've gotta get up, come on.
Get the kid out of here.
translation.es: Saquen a la niña de aquí.

translation.en: - Let go of me! - You need to get away from that thing.
Stop it!  Contain it and dismantle it!
He's more human than you'll ever be!
translation.es: ¡Es más humano de lo que usted puede ser!

translation.en: We need to get out of here.
We've got to get you someplace safe.
translation.es: Hay que llevarte a un lugar seguro.

translation.en: Bee, stop. They will kill you!

translation.es: Si los decépticons encuentran la Tierra,

translation.en: then our people are truly finished.
Go on. I'll buy you some time with these guys.
translation.es: Váyanse. Yo distraeré a esos tipos.

translation.en: We should really look into getting seatbelts.
Oh, my God, oh, my God.
It's okay. She's gonna steal the robot back, fight off the police,
translation.es: Está bien. Les robará de nuevo el robot, luchará contra la policía,

translation.en: kill two bigger robots, and come right back home.
translation.es: matará a dos robots más grandes, y volverá a la casa.

translation.en: There appears to be a high- speed chase underway just outside McKinnon Air Base.
translation.es: hay una persecución de alta velocidad en las afueras de la base aérea.

translation.en: You lose that car, I will personally rip your face off.
translation.es: Si pierdes ese auto, yo mismo te arrancaré la cara.

translation.en: Oh, God! It's all under control.
You pull that car over right this second.
This is very unsafe, what you're doing.
Mom, you got to get out of here, okay?
Mom... You have to trust me, please!
- We got to help her, Ron! - Hang on.
Oh, my gosh! What are you doing?
I saw this on Miami Vice.
- Oh. Oh. I got it, I got it, I got it. - Oh, my God!
Ron! We have a kid in the car!
I was trying to save the other kid! What was I--
translation.es: ¡Intentaba salvar a la otra niña! ¿Qué fue...?

translation.en: Otis? Otis, are you all right?
Preparing satellites to transmit our message.
translation.es: Preparando los satélites para transmitir nuestro mensaje.

translation.en: I hate this plan. Bee, I want to help.
translation.es: Odio este plan. Te quiero ayudar.

translation.en: ♪ I would hate anything To happen to her ♪
translation.es: Odiaría que le pasara algo a ella

translation.en: And you're listening to The Smiths.
Handle him! And finish the job this time!
translation.es: ¡Encárgate de él! ¡Y termina el trabajo esta vez!

translation.en: How the hell am I gonna get up there?
There. The one on the tower.
You think these little chains can hold...
translation.es: Crees que estas cadenitas van a dete...

translation.en: You need to get outta here.
I mean my friends are coming.
And they're gonna be looking for him.
Hey, can you call my mom?
Bee, I can't go with you.
You've got people out there that need you.
translation.es: Hay gente allá fuera que te necesita.

translation.en: Thank you...  So much...  For giving me...
for making me feel like me again.
Are you telling me you could've been a Camaro this whole time?
translation.es: ¿Pudiste ser un Camaro todo este tiempo?
LOS OBJETOS EN EL ESPEJO ESTÁN MÁS CERCA DE LO QUE PARECE No te olvides de mí

translation.en: Thank God you're all right. Thanks for coming, Mom.
translation.es: - Gracias a Dios que estás bien. - Gracias por venir, mamá.

translation.en: Well, I've taken a few notes.
I couldn't have done it without you guys.
translation.es: No podría haberlo hecho sin ustedes.

translation.en: Wow, um, what happened to you today?

translation.es: ¿Esto? Ya sabes... peleas con robots, persecuciones, desastres internacionales.
peleas con robots, persecuciones, desastres internacionales.

translation.en: - Not quite there yet. - Nope. - Yep. Okay, okay. - No. Yeah.
translation.es: - Aún no llegamos a ese punto. - ¿No? Está bien.

translation.en: Old friend, you kept this planet safe.
Because of you, we have a future, B- 127.
translation.es: Gracias a ti, tenemos futuro, B-127.

translation.en: Let's see if we got something.
